resources.string: When checked, allows ROOT to start Brevent server without \"USB Debugging\"\n\nRequires to pay 4 USD in total

Please pay 4 USD in total to use "Allow run as ROOT".

If you have paid, please disable Xposed, open Alipay, and tap Records. It should be recognized automatically.

If it cannot be recognized, or paid via non-Alipay, please send an email with a screenshot of payment details.
